duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize proprietary selling process to provide outstanding service, demonstrate products, and maintain product knowledge.
Represent company on social media platforms to showcase features and benefits of the product.
Offer additional financing options to customers and educate them about promotional offerings.
Maintain inventory accuracy, assist in promotional campaigns, and resolve customer service issues.
Support store standards and contribute to merchandising, marketing, and floor replenishment.
Maintain POS transactions, manage issues professionally, and act with integrity and trust.
Perform other duties as requested by management.
